title: Who should i get next
body:
I got 6300 IP...
I'm tossing up between Kallista, Rek'sai and Zed...
I main morgy support, but also play leona, nami, naut, lulu, annie,  and janna
In ADC i play jinx, cait, sivir. trist, MF and a bit of Kog
Mid i play Morg, syndra, lissandra, Cas and an ok ziggs or azir
JG i play Sej, Vi, Elise, evelynn and a bad lee sin or really bad nidalee :)
Top i play Shyv, mundo, morgy again, gnar, liss, lulu and trundle.
I'm a support main role, but i can play everywhere for fill purposes and my champ pool is already pretty deep. My order of skill is Sup, top, adc, mid, jg.
I can't find any other runes i want, and i feel i have all the pages i need too.

So out of those three who would be worth me getting/learning. As with most champs the more you play them the better you play against them, so thats a consideration, but I watch the LCS so i'm pretty damn familiar with their kits (I've zhonya'd so many death marks Zed players hate on me so bad). I could get Lucian, but i don't feel like his kit is my thing. Same deal with graves...

If you reccomend me something, give me a reason so i can properly consider it. Been sitting on this IP for a week now, without making a decision. Won't take me that long to build up another 6300, but for now i've got enough for one top tier champ.
